description:
######## 1.1.0: Enhanced the search option. Now you can search based on country or currency.  @Robert L thanks for supporting us. Fixed all Bugs. ########
* Now, get the real time currency rates with this application.
* The quickest and easiest way converter one currency to other currency.
* This app supports more than 200 country currencies are possible.
* Now you can search the currency just by enter country name or currency symbol.
* Just enter the value, from currency, to currency. It would connect to the network & it would be displaying the conversion of the entered value in real time.
* Details of the country & the currency also shown.

Features:
* 200 Currency conversions.
* Now, get the real time currency rates through this application.
* Details of the country & the currency also shown.
